name: Talk the Line
description:
You are a performer as you always knew you would be.

This is your moment, you have rehearsed your lines frantically over and over. Now for the real thing.

Read your line at the top of the screen and make sure you land on those specific words (in the right order). Landing on words not part of your line will not end well!

Controls:
Left arrow key: move left

Right arrow key: move right

Up arrow key: jump

Unfinished please be kind.
